references: goods coming inwards from EU suppliers

justifications: What worries some UK firms is that if they have to pay more for goods coming inwards from EU suppliers
These firms will have to join a member state's Non-EU VAT MOSS scheme, or register individually in each EU country they do business with.
UKFT.org has a listing of British clothing manufacturers on its site www.ukft.org
The World Trade Organisation's website has data around import and duty tariffs and regulations.
